name: Cats & Cards
description:
The beautiful Card World of Magic has been invaded by hordes of mice and it’s up to you to save the people! Join Solly and her fluffy friend Marcy on their challenging card journey through the miraculous but dangerous Solitaire World! Don’t forget your magic deck of cards that will help you on this adventure!

Visit our community at: www.facebook.com/cats.solitaire

• Experience a new amazing interpretation of the classic card game Solitaire!
• Gain 3 smiley stars on each level to uncover new species of funny cats! Have you heard of Zombiecat? Find him and many others in our game!
• Gather the themed cats collections to win special prizes! Can't find some rare kittens? Exchange with friends!
• Interesting and challenging obstacles await you on the way through magical worlds, such as The Turnip Village, The Scary Forest and much more!
• Master powerful boosters! They will guide you through the most challenging levels.
• Play with friends to see who can get the highest score in the card battle! A lot of adventurous levels to complete – more to come!
• Available to play on smartphones and tablet devices.

If you like solitaire games, you're going to love our Cats & Cards!

Please note that Cats & Cards solitaire is totally free to play but does include various in-app purchase options available within the game.
